title: Recaf: Recompile disabled, can't edit

comments.text: Please do not report Recaf bugs outside of the GitHub issues pages. Most of the time I won't see them: github.com/Col-E/Recaf/issues  Also I believe this can be resolved by reading the doc pages: coley.software/Recaf/doc-setup-8.html
Like I mentioned in the issues on the the page I wasn't sure if it was a bug or not so also asked here to see if anyone else has had similar issues with solutions they found
Tried 1-3 and didn't work. Point 4 helped thank you. I literally gave up on it for a bit.
@MarcoFernandes if you opened an issue on GitHub why you didnâ€™t link to it?
@IgorSkochinsky I did it after posting it here first
